channel.title: Tmux on The Plone Expanse
channel.description: Recent content in Tmux on The Plone Expanse

item.title: When did tmux get plugins?
item.description: Well, this is new to me. Apparently tmux now supports plugins. I don’t really know if I need any plugin, I enjoy tmux as it is right now (after some customizations) but it’s good to know that plugins finally exist for tmux. So, what do we have: First, the Tmux Plugin Manager: https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tpm Next, the tmux Facebook PathPicker plugin (which is a marvelous thing I didn’t knew existed): https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-fpp and https://github.
